p: In May 2011, there was a treatment effect on the native : non-native germination ratio ( F 5,40 = 3.01, P= 0.02); 1000w had a greater ratio than 100 or 700 ( T 1,40 = 3.02, P = 0.05 and T 1,40 = 3.16, P = 0.03; Fig. 2A–D). 1000w also had a marginally greater native : non-native ratio than 0 and 400 treatments ( T 1,40 = 2.81, P = 0.08 and T 1,40 = 2.80, P = 0.08). There was no effect of AC treatment on native species germination ( F 5,40 = 0.53, P = 0.75; Fig. 2E–H), but there was an effect of treatment on non-native species germination ( F 5,40 = 3.00, P = 0.02); 100 had greater germination than 1000w ( T 1,40 = 3.32, P = 0.02) and 700 was marginally greater than 1000w ( T 1,40 = 2.79, P = 0.08; Fig. 2I–L).
